latest.description: Right now, I'm learning more about legal rights, like taxes, and reading more books about philosophy. On top of those interesting topics, I'm also learning about how mobile apps work behind the scenes.

work: Recently, [REDACTED] invited me to join their team and talk about building something together. This is going to be great.
Sometimes I get hit with a sudden urge to sleep when I'm too focused on writing code, but it just goes away after I sip some coffee. It's interesting, right?
